titleStmt.title: The great interest of states & kingdomes. The second part. A sermon preached on a publike thanksgiving, on the 12th. of May, 1646. at Botolphs Alders-gate: and after (upon the desire of some friends) enlarged at Pauls Church in Covent-garden, on the Lords Day, May 17th. 1646. / By Simon Ford, minister of the Gospel at Puddle-Towne in Dorcet-shire.
titleStmt.author: Ford, Simon, 1619?-1699.

titleStmt.title: The great interest of states & kingdomes. The second part. A sermon preached on a publike thanksgiving, on the 12th. of May, 1646. at Botolphs Alders-gate: and after (upon the desire of some friends) enlarged at Pauls Church in Covent-garden, on the Lords Day, May 17th. 1646. / By Simon Ford, minister of the Gospel at Puddle-Towne in Dorcet-shire.
titleStmt.author: Ford, Simon, 1619?-1699.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Wilson, for Francis Eglesfield, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Marigold.,

notesStmt.note: There is no record of a first part, though Thomas Goodwin preached a sermon of the same name (Wing G1246A) the previous February.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
